text: qal alshaykh lmwsa: 'iiniy 'urid 'an azwwijk 'iihdaa abnty hatyn, ealaa 'an takun ajyrana li fi rey mashyty thamani sinin mqabl dhlk, fa'iina 'akmalt eshr sinin f'ihsan min endk, wama 'urid 'an 'ashuqa ealayk bjelha eshra, satajiduni 'iin sha' allah min alsaalihin fi hasan alshbt walwfa' bima qltu
